boardgame.name: Band of Brothers: Screaming Eagles
boardgame.description: Band of Brothers is a fast playing game of squad level combat in WWII. It covers the exploits of the 101st in their battles from D-Day through the Bulge. The rules are very simple (no combat charts are needed) with very few exceptions to remember and yet the game is meant to be all encompassing and will include infantry, tanks, and artillery._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Based on years of research, the game system uses a unique suppression mechanic. There are no longer two unique states for a unit, but varying degrees of suppression. This allows suppression to accumulate from multiple fire sources and means that the unit will not take a morale check until it is asked to do something. You will never know for sure how your units will respond until they are needed._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Although casualties can be caused by artillery and heavy weapons (which makes them prime battlefield targets), squads will never cause significant casualties shooting at range at dug in, first line troops. Their goal is to fire and maneuver. Sections of the enemy force must be pinned down and eliminated from up close. The system itself forces this realistic play. In a similar fashion, the system rewards you for spreading your troops out and other realistic game play._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Another unique feature of the game is its use of Proficiency and Casualty ratings to differentiate squads in areas besides just morale._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game is the first in a series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Band of Brothers: Ghost Panzer is a stand alone game that is set on the Eastern Front and follows the German 11th Panzer (Ghost) Division_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Other games under research are _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;The Old Breed_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; (the US 1st Marine Division) and a module that follows Commonwealth forces._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2011 Charles S. Roberts Best World War 2 Era Board Wargame Nominee
2011 Origins Awards Best Historical Board Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgameintegration: Band of Brothers: Old Breed South Pacific
Band of Brothers: Old Breed South Pacific

Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Worthington Games (WOG051) Designed by Jim Krohn. Band of Brothers is a squad level game covering the fighting of the 101st airborne from D-Day to the Bulge in their quest to liberate Europe from their Nazi oppressors. Geomorphic boards, counters, and a simple fast playing rule system make this game fun and gives an accurate feel of WWII squad level combat.

Game is complete in the original box. Counters have been rounded with a 2.5mm corner rounder and look amazing. Units have been pasted up for the v2 ruleset, however the foxholes/decoys have just been marked to change the modifier from a + to a - with a black sharpie. Also included are a set of community created solo AI cards for the scenario defender. See the BoB: SE forums for more details on these.

Bundle that includes Screaming Eagles and Ghost Panzer. Counters have been punched and corner clipped. Screaming Eagles counters have had a sticker applied to each unit to make them compatible with the updated Proficiency rules from Ghost Panzer. Various play aids and tutorials included.

If You live outside the EU You don´t have to pay the German VAT (we send You the new, lower price with the confirmation). We offer only goods that we have in stock, You can also visit our onlineshop www.gamers-hq.de for more games Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance.
